title: Creating workforce resilience in tech, media, and telecom
itunes:title: Creating workforce resilience in tech, media, and telecom
description: This past year, the race to upskill talent has jumped into the spotlight as not only a business imperative, but a social expectation. In our rapidly transforming digital landscape where the only constant is change, what can organizations do to build employee resilience and prepare the future workforce to reinvent itself?
